title: Vintage Whiskey fonts
content:
Please help me find the fonts on this Bulleit Bourbon label.

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bulleit label 1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903/http:/typophile.com/files/Bulleit%20label%201.png) | 290.45 KB |
author: lorrienchris

comments.content:
Need to redo your image link file. No picture here.  
don

Some similarity to the 1917 condensed version by Lanston Monotype of a 1903 font design by the Keystone Foundry, digitized by Red Rooster as Hancock RR

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/HancockRRAsBULLEITBOURBON_5402.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/hancock-rr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/hancock-rr/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/hancock-rr/") and by Claude Pelletier as John Hancock CP [http://www.dafont.com/john-hancock-cp.font?text=BULLEIT+BOURBON](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903/http:/www.dafont.com/john-hancock-cp.font?text=BULLEIT+BOURBON "http://www.dafont.com/john-hancock-cp.font?text=BULLEIT+BOURBON")  
Don

Also somewhat similar Newsprint JNL and Newsprint Narrow JNL

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NewsprintJNLAsBULLEITBOURBON_5680.gif)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NewsprintJNLNewsprintJNLNarrowAsBULLEITBOURBON_3958.gif)
  [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/newsprint/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/newsprint/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jnlevine/newsprint/")  
Don

I found a large scale image of the label at [http://askmissa.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/iBulleit-Bourbonmg\_2070.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903/http:/askmissa.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/iBulleit-Bourbonmg_2070.jpg "http://askmissa.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/iBulleit-Bourbonmg\_2070.jpg")  
This enables me to provide more precise answers  
\_BULLEIT BOURBON\_ is ITC Cheltenham Pro Condensed Ultra  
\_KENTUCKY STRAIGHT BOURBON\_ is also a Cheltenham [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/cheltenham/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/cheltenham/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/cheltenham/")  
\_FRONTIER WHISKEY\_ is Bank Gothic [http://www.myfonts.com/search/bank+gothic/fonts/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150215103903/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/bank+gothic/fonts/ "http://www.myfonts.com/search/bank+gothic/fonts/")  
Don
Thanks again, Don. That was a huge help for this country chic wedding label I am helping create!
